amendment.description: Making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 2680 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S6916-6917) Making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes.
